speech:
An intent categorises an end-user's intention for one conversation turn. When an end-user writes or says something, referred to as an end-user expression, Dialogflow matches the end-user expression to the best intent in your agent.  

If you have FAQs with multiple questions & answers, create an intent for each of the questions.  

Process of adding a new intent :  

1. Go to the Dialogflow ES Console.
2. Select an agent.
3. Select Intents in the left sidebar menu.
4. Click the add add button next to Intents in the left sidebar menu.
5. Enter a name for your intent. Your intent name should represent the end-user expressions it recognises.
6. Add training expressions ( questions user can ask ) & response to that
7. Click Save.  

You can add following rich content types in Dialogflow Messenger using custom payload.
1) Info/Card
2) Description
3) Image
4) Button
5) List
6) Accordion
7) Suggestion chips
